```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
salmon<-read_csv("salmon_imports.csv")
```
#Exploratory scatterplot
```{r}
salmon_scatter<- ggplot(salmon, aes(x = year, y= salmon_imports))+
  geom_point()
salmon_scatter

#Yes it looks like it makes sense to use a linear regression.
```
